thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 5 of 65
thread.title: Angela

author: Angela
title: Angela
text: My travel agent was very good,she was knowledgeable, professional and she was excited about my trip , my birthday and my family !!! She was totally engaging with my vision.. I knew where I wanted to stay when I called but she made the rest of my experience and my sister n laws experience just 100 percent .. if I could recommend her to everyone that I know I would ... she is the best !!
